name: Get it out! (RedDragonMakesGames)
description:
Get it out is a completely automatically generated puzzle minigame. Use the arrow keys to move the balls out of the grid from cells with a gap in them. Moving any of the balls into blocked off cells or walls will lose.

Each position is completely random, meaning most will be quite easy, but some may be very difficult! You can configure the size of the grid, maximum number of balls and the number of moves to use in puzzle generation.
